constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 152 (Wednesday, September 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. LARSEN of Washington:
H.R. 8938.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
As written in Article 1, Section 1 ``all legislative
powers herein granted shall be vested in a Congress of the
United States, which shall consist of a Senate and a House of
Representatives.''
[Page H8066]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: Prioritizing Digital Infrastructure Financing Act
